title: SMC_FollowVelocity (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_FollowVelocity
This function block writes set velocities to the axis without doing any checks.
Note
This function block does not support forecasts that are set up by
SMC_SetForecast
.

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows: Set velocity in technical units per second.

rows.Name: bBusy
rows.Comment: TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished.

rows: TRUE: Command has been aborted by another command.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
